 * frameworks/base

 * kernel/oneplus/msm8996
4c35624  Linux 3.18.133  [Greg Kroah-Hartman]
aa2f510  mm, proc: be more verbose about unstable VMA flags in /proc/<pid>/smaps  [Michal Hocko]
fd1f971  ocfs2: fix panic due to unrecovered local alloc  [Junxiao Bi]
5f95437  sysfs: Disable lockdep for driver bind/unbind files  [Daniel Vetter]
98b7013  ALSA: bebob: fix model-id of unit for Apogee Ensemble  [Takashi Sakamoto]
1d8db45  dm snapshot: Fix excessive memory usage and workqueue stalls  [Nikos Tsironis]
4982226  dm kcopyd: Fix bug causing workqueue stalls  [Nikos Tsironis]
4f7d2b6  perf parse-events: Fix unchecked usage of strncpy()  [Arnaldo Carvalho de Melo]
7b20a6d  perf svghelper: Fix unchecked usage of strncpy()  [Arnaldo Carvalho de Melo]
a873406  mmc: atmel-mci: do not assume idle after atmci_request_end  [Jonas Danielsson]
b0787de8  kconfig: fix memory leak when EOF is encountered in quotation  [Masahiro Yamada]
8cd9a94  clk: imx6q: reset exclusive gates on init  [Lucas Stach]
2ace487  scsi: target: use consistent left-aligned ASCII INQUIRY data  [David Disseldorp]
5a571a9  net: call sk_dst_reset when set SO_DONTROUTE  [yupeng]
9046355  media: firewire: Fix app_info parameter type in avc_ca{,_app}_info  [Nathan Chancellor]
15a6405  powerpc/pseries/cpuidle: Fix preempt warning  [Breno Leitao]
ec7f992  pstore/ram: Do not treat empty buffers as valid  [Joel Fernandes (Google)]
fa1e3a4  jffs2: Fix use of uninitialized delayed_work, lockdep breakage  [Daniel Santos]
84a9b63  MIPS: SiByte: Enable swiotlb for SWARM, LittleSur and BigSur  [Maciej W. Rozycki]
f9eb72f  r8169: Add support for new Realtek Ethernet  [Kai-Heng Feng]
e23a158  media: vb2: be sure to unlock mutex on errors  [Mauro Carvalho Chehab]
661fda2  drm/fb-helper: Ignore the value of fb_var_screeninfo.pixclock  [Ivan Mironov]
a17189a  block/loop: Use global lock for ioctl() operation.  [Tetsuo Handa]
ca554da  sctp: allocate sctp_sockaddr_entry with kzalloc  [Xin Long]
f643372  selinux: fix GPF on invalid policy  [Stephen Smalley]
8554867  sunrpc: handle ENOMEM in rpcb_getport_async  [J. Bruce Fields]
babd8d8  media: vb2: vb2_mmap: move lock up  [Hans Verkuil]
3c2350d  media: vivid: set min width/height to a value > 0  [Hans Verkuil]
16e1876  media: vivid: fix error handling of kthread_run  [Hans Verkuil]
c089cbb  omap2fb: Fix stack memory disclosure  [Vlad Tsyrklevich]
1f88472  Disable MSI also when pcie-octeon.pcie_disable on  [YunQiang Su]
14e1fc9  mfd: tps6586x: Handle interrupts on suspend  [Jonathan Hunter]
6f5685a  scsi: sd: Fix cache_type_store()  [Ivan Mironov]
d90b262  Yama: Check for pid death before checking ancestry  [Kees Cook]
ca22587  btrfs: wait on ordered extents on abort cleanup  [Josef Bacik]
98d2b24  crypto: authenc - fix parsing key with misaligned rta_len  [Eric Biggers]
23009dc  net: bridge: fix a bug on using a neighbour cache entry without checking its state  [JianJhen Chen]
8c871bd  packet: Do not leak dev refcounts on error exit  [Jason Gunthorpe]
4d97ac0  ipv6: fix kernel-infoleak in ipv6_local_error()  [Eric Dumazet]
3ce837a  media: em28xx: Fix misplaced reset of dev->v4l::field_count  [Ben Hutchings]
4c3b21c  can: gw: ensure DLC boundaries after CAN frame modification  [Oliver Hartkopp]
9751561  tty/ldsem: Wake up readers after timed out down_write()  [Dmitry Safonov]
b1c0a2b9  sunrpc: use-after-free in svc_process_common()  [Vasily Averin]
ddcd89c  crypto: cts - fix crash on short inputs  [Eric Biggers]
96e2cd7  i2c: dev: prevent adapter retries and timeout being set as minus value  [Yi Zeng]
fe19dc9  ACPI: power: Skip duplicate power resource references in _PRx  [Hans de Goede]
67dd0ed  slab: alien caches must not be initialized if the allocation of the alien cache failed  [Christoph Lameter]
84fe5c6  USB: storage: add quirk for SMI SM3350  [Icenowy Zheng]
5a2cac0  USB: storage: don't insert sane sense for SPC3+ when bad sense specified  [Icenowy Zheng]
93e9556  usb: cdc-acm: send ZLP for Telit 3G Intel based modems  [Daniele Palmas]
ac72ab6  cifs: Fix potential OOB access of lock element array  [Ross Lagerwall]
de92e4b  CIFS: Do not hide EINTR after sending network packets  [Pavel Shilovsky]
0c9c58b  sparc32: Fix inverted invalid_frame_pointer checks on sigreturns  [Andreas Larsson]
